WorkItem.Description:
The Service Control Manager (SCM) and the System Event Notification Service have notifications corresponding to most of the Winlogon notifications. We can use one of them to retrieve the Winlogon notifications.
We can use the Service Control Manager via HandlerEX Callback Function.
We can use System Event Notification Service via ISensLogon interface (COM).
Reference:
http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc721961(WS.10).aspx
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms685150(VS.85).aspx
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc185680(VS.85).aspx
WorkItem.Summary: How to receive Winlogon notifications in Windows service application
